text:
@michaelgove @MarosSefcovic One thing's for certain, there won't be any statues for you & Johnson🤦🏻‍♂️
In future, history will say how were this pair of absolute numpties ever allowed at top of govt?
65k #COVID19
deaths & counting on your watch, and now the economy about to go into tail spin
